page.title: 04COUNCIL FOR ELY 2
page.content: On Friday 28th June Councillor Currie Jones came to see us.When he came he talked about many things,he gives advice on housing,roads and parks.After he had talked to us we were allowed to ask him questions, some of us asked him some hard questions and he could not answer any of them,but he tried to answer them. He is the one that helps to give the school money to buy books and equipment.We asked him how many Primary schools there are and he said there are seven Primary schools and he told us how many Secondary schools and there were only two of them in Ely.We could go down Caerau Lane on a Saturday morning and we could talk to him during one and a half hours.He is Councillor for Trelai ward.At eleven o'clock Councillor Currie Jones had to go and we said good_bye to him.
